title: BRIEF-Net 1 UEPS Technologies, Reports Preliminary Fourth Quarter And Full Year 2019 Results
text:
BRIEF-Net 1 UEPS Technologies, Reports Preliminary Fourth Quarter And Full Year 2019 Results

Stock Markets 46 minutes ago (Sep 26, 2019 22:30)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Net 1 UEPS Technologies, Reports Preliminary Fourth Quarter And Full Year 2019 Results Sept 26 (Reuters) - Net 1 UEPS Technologies Inc : * NET 1 UEPS TECHNOLOGIES, INC. REPORTS PRELIMINARY FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2019 RESULTS * Q4 REVENUE $71.2 MILLION * QTRLY GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $2.63 * QTRLY FUNDAMENTAL LOSS PER SHARE $2.45 * NET 1 UEPS TECHNOLOGIES - "HAVE STABILIZED OUR BUSINESS IN SOUTH AFRICA, AND WE ARE FOCUSED ON RETURNING TO GROWTH AND PROFITABILITY IN FISCAL 2020" * NET 1 UEPS TECHNOLOGIES - IN FISCAL 2020, CO EXPECTS TO GENERATE ADJUSTED EBITDA OF AT LEAST $16 MILLION USING A CONSTANT CURRENCY BASE OF ZAR 14.27/$1 * NET 1 UEPS - CONTINUE TO REVIEW PORTFOLIO OF INVESTMENTS FOR THOSE THAT DO NOT FIT STRATEGIC FOCUS, WILL ACCORDINGLY BE EVALUATED FOR MONETIZATION

BRIEF-Net 1 UEPS Technologies, Reports Preliminary Fourth Quarter And Full Year 2019 Results
description: BRIEF-Net 1 UEPS Technologies, Reports Preliminary Fourth Quarter And Full Year 2019 Results
